headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.mapbox.com *.supabase.co *.supabase.in unpkg.com cdnjs.cloudflare.com js.sentry-cdn.com browser.sentry-cdn.com api.mapbox.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.mapbox.com fonts.googleapis.com api.mapbox.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.mapbox.com *.supabase.co *.supabase.in *.tile.openstreetmap.org *.unsplash.com *.tiles.mapbox.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' *.mapbox.com *.supabase.co *.supabase.in api.mapbox.com events.mapbox.com sentry.io *.vercel-analytics.com wss://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.in; media-src 'self' blob: https: *.supabase.co *.supabase.in; worker-src 'self' blob:; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content;
camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(self), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=()
